name: The Lost Lands: Dinosaur Hunter
summary: In all verity The Lost Lands: Dinosaur Hunter is one of the most lovely simulators of Dinosaur Hunter. You'll have to investigate the most secretive object in the world called "The Lost Lands". To meet with living dinosaurs, which became extinct hundreds millions years ago. To see the T-Rex and to feel the death's breath. The world of The Lost Lands: Dinosaur Hunter is waiting for you!!
